full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RLUNG RTA'I DAR BAR BSKYED PA'I BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B ZHES RLUNG RTA DAR BAR BYED PA'I BSANGS MCHOD YID BZHIN NOR BU 'DI NI BLA MA @006A *, ,DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LAS 'BYUNG BA LTAR, MDOR BSDUS NAS RANG DANG` SKAL BA MNYAM PA'I GZHAN LA PHAN PA'I LHAG BSAM DGAR PAS, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA GZUGS BRNYAN STON LAS RATNA MING CAN GYI BRIS PA'O, ,DE MI NOR 'SHUL CI MCHIS PA MKHAS RNAMS KYIS KHREL BZOB NA MDZOD, ,YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN KYI SKYES BU DAM PA DANG, BSTAN SKYONG BA'I SBYIN BDAG RNAMS KYIS 'PHRIN LAS MNGA' THANG PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS NAS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE'I YUN RING DU GNAS PAR BYA BA'I CHED DU BSNGO'O,, ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,
